snippet: Fabian Espindola broke a scoreless tie in the 60th minute with his first goal since April 20 and Jonny Steele scored with two minutes left, giving the Red Bulls a victory over Houston.
abstract: New York Red Bulls beat Houston Dynamo, 2-0.
lead_paragraph: Fabian Espindola broke a scoreless tie in the 60th minute with his first goal since April 20 and Jonny Steele scored with two minutes left, giving the Red Bulls a victory over Houston.

headline.main: Red Bulls End Drought by Beating Houston
